name: CatStack (dyloln, kaaskrans)
description:
Welcome to CatStack!

In this world, you collect cats and stack them as high as you can, while avoiding the patrolling robots.

Controls

  • Moving: WASD
  • Looking: Mouse
  • Interact: E
  • Restart game: R

How to play

  • The cat closest to you will tell you to collect the cats and stack them on him
  • Pickup the other cats and bring them to the first cat
  • Try and stack the cats as high as you can
  • Avoid the robots (run or hide in trashcans)
  • Let us know your high-score!

Theme

The theme of this game jam was rise and fall. The cats can be stacked, and will fall when you get game over.
